source_sentence: 即娑婆之界誓心利物故立方便之門□□□□□惠建八極安祥樂音競走[敲-高+壹]來迎梵□□□□前引意謂佃役難却妖分鬼魅遠千里□□□□於地戶總斯多善莫限良緣先用□□□□四王龍天八部伏願威光熾盛福力彌增興□□□□救人護國又持勝福次用莊嚴我河西節□。
translation: 即娑婆之界誓心利物故立方便之門□□□□□惠建八極安祥樂音競走[敲-高+壹]來迎梵□□□□前引意謂佃役難却妖分鬼魅遠千里□□□□於地戶總斯多善莫限良緣先用□□□□四王龍天八部伏願威光熾盛福力彌增興□□□□救人護國又持勝福次用莊嚴我河西節□。
May the□□□□□□□□□□ great king be exalted.
May the venerable director of the northern pole of the South ...
He'll be the human king of bodhisattvas.
He'll always be answerable to the Tathāgata's instructions.
He'll also uphold the superior merit and adorn it with secondary uses.

source_sentence: 我河西都僧統和尚貴位。
translation: I, the monk Saṃgha of the western part of the river, am exalted in rank.

source_sentence: 伏願敫楊政述鎮遏□□色力堅於丘山。
translation: May I pray that I may be able to assist Yang Zhengshu in his quest to suppress... ...the power of form is strong in the hills and mountains.

source_sentence: 惠命延於遐□□□勝福次用□□□指撝尚書貴位。
translation: May his mandate be extended far and wide.

source_sentence: 伏願金柯永茂玉葉時芳盤石增薰唯城作鎮。
translation: May the golden bark always flourish, and the jade leaves grow fragrant as the pebbles increase in permeation, so that only the city may become a town.
He also upholds the Śrīgupta blessing and then uses it to adorn the town.

source_sentence: 閻都衙薰都衙諸都頭貴位。
translation: May the gold keels always flourish, the jade leaves always look fragrant, the pans and rocks increase in permeation, and only the city becomes a town.

source_sentence: 伏願奇才出眾無藝召輪歸懷戍物之能共助明王之道。
translation: May wondrous talents, outstanding abilities, and the ability to summon wheel-turners to Huaihuai garrison things together help the bright king's path.
Then the world will be settled, the seas will be cleared, and the interior will be cleared.
I've never heard of the name of conquest.
They'll rely on the support of their support.
Mahāprajñāpāramitā's benefits and pleasures knew no bounds.
The great multitude of devotees recites it universally.
